messages.subject: Re: Lord of the Rings: Return of the King
messages.msgSnippet: yeeehaw! It s playin in Utah!!! Well, in Idaho, too, but UT is closer than Boise to us! gonna get there, hell or high water... a question: is this the three
messages.messageBody:
yeeehaw! It's playin in Utah!!! Well, in Idaho, too, but UT is closer
than Boise to us!

gonna get there, hell or high water...


a question: is this the three film run, where they start on the day
before ROTK is released, showing Fellowship, then Two Towers, and at
midnight, ROTK? Or is it ROTK without any cuts? Either way...my 15
yod wants to go...so do I

thanks :)

HeidiC


--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, TreeGoddess

messages.subject: Re: Lord of the Rings: Return of the King
messages.msgSnippet: Wow!  I need more sleep or glasses..... the extended edition movie is NOT the next movie, but rather the 1st one in a longer version.  LMAO Whew - I need
messages.messageBody:
Wow! I need more sleep or glasses..... the extended edition movie is
NOT the next movie, but rather the 1st one in a longer version. LMAO
Whew - I need sleep. hehehe

TreeGoddess

messages.subject: Lord of the Rings: Return of the King
messages.msgSnippet: We bought our tickets today for the Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King special Extended Edition of the film.  LOL  Just wanted to pass along the info so
messages.messageBody:
We bought our tickets today for the Lord of the Rings: The Return of the
King special Extended Edition of the film. LOL Just wanted to pass
along the info so you can get advanced tickets for the longer version.
You can get tickets at http://lordoftherings.net/index_flat.html go to
the lower right box on that page where it says, "Buy Extended Edition
Tickets!".


The Extended Edition is playing only at these theaters:
State, City Theater
